title: Childish Gambino Cancels Australia & New Zealand Tour
description: All ticketholders are eligible for an automatic refund generated by Ticketek.

title: Local Supports Added To 2025 New Bloom Fest
description: Bands including Wayside, Wifecult, and Gloam will open proceedings in Brisbane, Sydney, and Melbourne.

title: Arson Suspected In Fire That Claimed Melbourne's LUX Nightclub
description: Firefighters were called to the Chapel Street nightclub just before 2am on Thursday, November 21st.

title: Lakefield Temple On Their Brand Of 'Dream-Synth-Pop-Rock' And Getting Your Foot In The Door
description: From an ad on on a ‘seeking musicians’ page, to accolades from WAM and rage, here’s how Lakefield Temple are breaking through as a band.

title: The Angels To Receive Laneway Named After Them
description: The Angels are in impressive company with artists who have received music laneways in Adelaide, including Sia and Cold Chisel.

title: XG Announce 2025 Australian Tour Dates
description: XG made their Australian debut last year, delivering an unforgettable concert experience as part of the inaugural SXSW Sydney.

title: How To Access Your Spotify Wrapped Early
description: Find out how to access your music-listening stats ahead of Spotify Wrapped's 2024 launch.

title: Jet City Sports Club “Grow Up” On Their New Single ‘Mini Skirt’
description: For fans of The Cure and The Cranberries, get stuck into some hearty indie rock/pop from out of Eora.

title: Melbourne Floating Nightclub ATET To Return For 'One Night Only'
description: Returning for one night only, ATET will have a "new look" but "same vibe."

title: The Brave Return From Hiatus With ‘Breaking Out’
description: The Brisbane metal band have today released their first new song since 2019.
